title: Introduction to the Cisco Intersight REST API
slug: This Introduction to the Cisco Intersight REST API Learning Lab will guide you through the creation of a Cisco Intersight account, the claiming of Cisco UCS Devices, and the creation of Cisco Intersight REST API Keys.
